name: City Police Motorcycle Simulator 3D
description:
Feel like a real policeman on duty playing these unusual police chase simulator in 3D!

You’re the only hope of peaceful citizens – a special policeman, armed and riding a bike! Join the war police forces waged against criminals, patrol city blocks and prevent crime activity! Become a real hero with City Police Motorcycle Simulator 3D!

After a massive escape from the city prison, hundreds of criminals have broken free and flooded the streets like a stream of scum! Pushers, prostitutes, robbers, murderers – all of them transformed your home town into a pit of thugs!

Race on your powerful machine - the police bike – and earn money for each caught criminal! Use earned money to raise up your vehicle characteristics, or even to buy a new one!

Chase the fugitive criminals, catch them and transfer them to the prison with City Police Motorcycle Simulator 3D!

City Police Motorcycle Simulator 3D features:
Ultimate police chase simulator!
Start the chase through the city streets
Wide range of missions – find and catch all criminals
Earn points to buy new bike

Do your best and save the city from the criminal scum with City Police Motorcycle Simulator 3D!
